attributes.additional_details: The EU  is/has ruined this once great country,its time for change ...whats wrong with protectionism,whats wrong with capital punishment when beyond reasonable doubt,and what is wrong with stopping the free for all society expected by so many.We need to to cap our immigration influx now and protect our front line services..We can no longer be the soft touch of Europe.Lets be governed by the people for the people!.We can only do this by leaving the EU,.LETS GET BACK OUR INDEPENDANCE..Time for a referendum ..
